PaymentPolicy.content_1: Customers pay directly at the store
PaymentPolicy.content_3: + Check in at the store Customers pay online
PaymentPolicy.content_5: + Any free gift Customers who need to complain or return products due to Tonatra's fault can contact Hotline 0292 3831 530 for the earliest support.
PaymentPolicy.content_6: The consultant will guide the customer through the necessary steps to make the payment.
